vision.notes: Visual capabilities in Odontopygidae are not specified in the provided context.

chemoreception.notes: As millipedes, Odontopygidae likely rely on chemoreception for navigation, food detection, and communication, although the specifics are unknown.

mechanoreception.notes: Millipedes generally possess mechanoreceptors for detecting vibrations and tactile stimuli. Likely present in Odontopygidae.
